pages.text: $(bgreen)Iceberg Lettuce$() is not allowed to stare at. If you do, it will be your last step... but only if you're a zombie.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)0$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-kill$() plant, which will $(baqua)freeze and chill$() the first close enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() it will $(baqua)freeze and chill$() all enemies in range.
